sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-text-field
    outlined
    dense 
    v-model="valorMonetario" 
    v-money="money"
    :prepend-inner-icon="prependIcon"
    :append-icon="suffixIcon"
    :error-messages="errorMessages"
    :hide-details="blHideDetails"
  />
</template>
<script>
import formataMoedaMixin from "@/mixins/formataMoedaMixin"

export default {
  name: 'CampoMonetario',

  mixins: [ formataMoedaMixin ],

  props: {
    value: { type: [String, Number] },
    blPorcentagem: { type: Boolean, default: false },
    intDecimais: { type: Number, default: 2 },
    appendIcon: { type: String, default: '', required: false },
    blHideDetails: { type: Boolean, required: false, default: true },
    errorMessages: { type: Array, required: false }
  },

  data() {
    return {
      valorMonetario: null,
      prependIcon: 'R$ ',
      suffixIcon: '',
      inicio: true,
      money: {
        decimal: ',',
        thousands: '.',
        prefix: '',
        suffix: '',
        precision: 2,
        masked: false
      }
    }
  },

  created() {
    this.valorMonetario = this.value;
    this.inicio = false;

    if (this.blPorcentagem) {
      this.prependIcon = '';
      this.suffixIcon = ' %';
    }

    if (this.appendIcon != '') {
      this.suffixIcon = this.appendIcon;
      this.prependIcon = '';
    }

    this.money.precision = this.intDecimais
  },

  watch: {
    valorMonetario() {
      if (this.inicio) {
        return;
      }
      this.$emit('input', this.convertePadraoBase(this.valorMonetario));
    },
    value(newValue, oldValue) {
      if (this.inicio) {
        return;
      }
      if (this.inicio) {
        this.valorMonetario = oldValue;
        this.inicio = false;
        return;
      }
    }
  },
}
</script>
